summary: Adds lautasantenni Expanded Jewelry Crafting mod to the loot list.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30393-1-1359770083.jpg[/img] [img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30393-1-1359769384.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][b][size=6.5][color=Red]Requires Skyrim version 1.8.151.0.7 or higher.[/color][/size][/b][/font][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][b][size=6.5][color=Red]NOT SUPPORTED ON OLDER VERSIONS!!![/color][/size][/b][/font][/center]


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Description[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]This mod replaces yes repoaces lautasantenni\\\'s ExpandedJewelryCrafting.esp with mine to save plugin space for those who are pushing the limit (=255). It adds his jewelry items to the Leveled item jewelry loot list. I did not change lautasantenni\\\'s mod, I only added to it.[/color][/size][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]I would like everyone to know that credit for having me take another look at how I was making the mod is given to our community friend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5630546]JobVanDam[/url].[/color][/size][/font]


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Required mods[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]The mod requires resources from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8361]Expanded Jewelry Crafting[/url] verson 2.30 by lautasantenni[/color][/size][/font]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8361][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30456-1-1359145645.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Installing[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]Install using [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] (NMM) Simply click \\\"Download with Manager\\\" button and activate the mod to initialize the installer.[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]Install using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye bash[/url] use the \\\"..download manually\\\" link. Drop the downloaded 7zip file directly into your \\\"..\\\\Bash Installers\\\" folder.[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]For manual install users, extract the \\\"ExpnandedJewelryCrafting.esp\\\" file from [url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html] 7zip[/url] file and place it where your \\\\Skyrim\\\\Data folder is. It will ask you if you want to overwrite the file. Say yes. This will replace lautasantenni\\\'s .esp with my .esp file. The file path should look like this: ..\\\\STEAM\\\\SteamApps\\\\common\\\\skyrim\\\\Data\\\\(this is where the .esp files go)[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]
[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Uninstalling[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) Simply click \\\"uninstall\\\" button.[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]Uninstall using Wrye bash in the Installers tabe simply right click on the mod and uninstall it.[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]For manual install users, Delete the ExpandedJewelryCrafting.esp associated with the mod from your \\\\Skyrim\\\\Data folder is. The file path should look like this: ..\\\\STEAM\\\\SteamApps\\\\common\\\\skyrim\\\\Data (this is where the .esp files go)[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]

[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Incompatibility[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]None that I am aware of. If you find anything, please tell me.[/color][/size][/font]


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Known Issues and/or Bugs[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]None that I am aware of. If you find anything, please tell me.[/color][/size][/font]


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Future plans[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]Make them Enchanted items and add them to the Leveled item Ench loot list.[/color][/size][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]Add items to Dawnguard enemies.[/color][/size][/font]


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]History[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list]
[*][size=2]1.0, 01-24-2013 - Initial release[/size]
[*][size=2]1.1, 01-24-2013 - Just little cleaning[/size]
[*][size=2]1.2, 01-25-2013 - It is no longer a patch but a replacer .esp[/size]
[*][size=2]1.3, 02-02-2013 - Total rewrite: Now the Expanded Jewelry Crafting items will be looted at the same rate as the vanilla non-enchanted jewelry items.[/size]
[*][size=2]1.4, 02-03-2013 - Fixed an issue in verson 1.3 vanilla loot rate with some of the jewelry not showing in 3rd person. Now there is a Expanded Jewelry Crafting LL All-In-One NMM Installer.[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]

[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Contact[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][size=2][color=white]You can contact me leaving a comment at the mod\\\'s thread, or sending me a PM.[/color][/size][/font]


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Tools Used[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list=1]
[*][size=2]Construction Kit (available on Steam)[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/sevenzip/] 7zip[/url] at SourceForge[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye bash[/url] by Wrye Bash Team[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]TES5Edit[/url] by ElminsterAU[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1334]ModOrganizer[/url] by Tannin[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]

[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Permissions[/color][/size][/b][/font]
Permission is NOT given to redistribute this mod in whole or in part.


[font=times new roman][b][size=5][color=Yellow]Credits[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=times new roman][color=white][list=1]
[*][size=2]Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.[/size]
[*][size=2]Thanks to lautasantenni for giving me premission to make this patch, and for the outstanding meshes and textures of his mod.[/size]
[*][size=2]Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.[/size]
[*][size=2]Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools and help.[/size]
[*][size=2]Thanks to all of you that are using this mod and are helping me to improve it with your suggestions.[/size]
[/list][/color][/font]
author: SIGMALOG

files.name: Expanded Jewelry Crafting-LL-vanilla
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed an issue in verson 1.3 vanilla loot rate with some of the jewelry not showing in 3rd person.
Now there is a Expanded Jewelry Crafting LL All-In-One NMM Installer.

Now there is a Expanded Jewelry Crafting LL All-In-One NMM Installer.
